template.value:
<!doctype html> <html class="no-js" lang="en">
<head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" /> <script src="bower_components/modernizr/modernizr.js"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" href="bower_components/foundation/css/foundation.css"/> <title></title> </head> <body> $END$
<script src="bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js"></script> <script src="bower_components/foundation/js/foundation.min.js"></script> </body>
</html>
